season.name: Clan Voyage
season.headline: Clan-based gameplay with Rare Book of Cards rewards, new events and challenges
season.metaTitle: Clash Royale Season 75 (Sep 2025) — Clan Voyage | cooper-huff.com
season.metaDescription: Explore Clash Royale Season 75: Clan Voyage featuring clan-based gameplay, new events, and rewards. Complete guide to September 2025 season.

upcomingSeason.name: Phantom Forces
upcomingSeason.headline: Royal Ghost Evolution, Skeleton Army Evolution, Champion System Rework, and Lucky Chests

newEvolutions.name: Royal Ghost Evolution
newEvolutions.description: Summons two 'Souldiers' upon attacking from invisibility, dealing area damage and guarding the Royal Ghost

newEvolutions.name: Skeleton Army Evolution
newEvolutions.description: Led by General Gerry, making Skeletons invisible and invincible while he's alive; upon his defeat, all Skeletons become vulnerable

events.name: Clan Voyage
events.description: Clan-based gameplay emphasizing teamwork and cooperation with Rare Book of Cards rewards

events.name: Season 75 Challenges
events.description: Various challenges and events throughout the season

championSystemRework.title: Champion System Rework (Season 76)
championSystemRework.description: Major changes to how Champions work in the game
changes: Champions will cycle like normal cards (no more 3-card cycle)
Only the most recently played Champion will have an active ability
Active Champion indicated by crown icon
Ability cooldowns reset upon deploying a new Champion

luckyChests.title: Lucky Chests (Season 76)
luckyChests.description: Replacing Lucky Drops with guaranteed reward chests

types.name: Magic Lucky Chests
types.rewards: Cards, gold, magic items, and cosmetics

types.name: Seasonal Lucky Chests
types.rewards: Season-themed rewards like Evolution Shards and cosmetics

nerfs.change: Number of cycles to activate Evolution increased from 1 to 2
Barrage damage decreased from 353 to 304
HP decreased from 1,187 to 1,080, Bonus Brawler HP removed
HP decreased from 2,096 to 1,907, Bonus Brawler HP removed
Death damage decreased from 291 to 258
Heal per skeleton decreased from 76 to 64
Damage decreased from 102 to 97
HP decreased from 332 to 304
Movement speed increased from 45 to 60
First spawn time increased from 0.8 seconds to 1 second
HP decreased from 3,233 to 3,020; backpack attack range decreased from 5.5 to 5 tiles; backpack first hit time increased from 0.4 to 0.5 seconds
HP decreased from 1,228 to 1,180
HP decreased from 2,304 to 2,150; rocket damage decreased from 391 to 304
First hit time increased from 0.4 seconds to 0.5 seconds
Slowdown effect hit speed multiplier increased from x0.65 to x0.70; slowdown effect speed multiplier increased from x0.65 to x0.70
Hit speed decreased from 1 hit every 1.1 seconds to 1 hit every 1.2 seconds
Hit speed multiplier decreased from x1.35 to x1.30 (affects Lumberjack and Barbarians Evolution)
HP decreased from 2,921 to 2,703
Hit speed decreased from 1 hit every 1 second to 1 hit every 1.1 seconds (affects Graveyard, Skeleton Army, Skeleton Barrel, Skeleton King, Tombstone, and Witch)
Damage decreased from 335 to 306; number of damage ticks decreased from 5 to 2; duration decreased from 2.5 seconds to 2 seconds

bugFixes.fix: Prevent troops from having instant first attack after charge reset
bugFixes.affectedCards: Battle Ram, Dark Prince, Prince, Ram Rider, Royal Recruits Evolution

sources.name: Season 76 Preview
sources.description: Official Season 76 preview with new evolutions and system changes
